title: Understanding Parent Stress
text: Parents of children with autism often face unique challenges that can lead to increased stress. Understanding these challenges is the first step in providing support.

title: Effective Communication
text: Frequent and open communication between educators and parents can help alleviate stress by ensuring parents feel heard and involved in their child's education.

title: Building Support Networks
text: Encouraging the creation of support networks among families can provide parents with a sense of community and shared experience, reducing feelings of isolation.

hintAnswer: listen, communicate frequently, and be responsive to their concerns and input
title: Key Strategies for Educators
text: What are some key strategies educators can use to lessen parent stress?
choices: listen, communicate frequently, and be responsive to their concerns and input
strive to create networks for these families
create and assert your own programs for support
